phasing_details.phase_detail: Front and rear fenestration alterations and renovation of front landscaping, wall finish, new bin storage and iron fencing.

borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Replacement of 1no existing single glazed timber framed window with new double glazed uPVC framed French doors, and alterations to the roof of bay window to incorporate a flat roof and the erection of metal iron railings around the flat roof at second floor level to the rear elevation in connection with its use as a terrace; replacement of the existing single glazed timber framed window to the centre of the bay with new double glazed uPVC framed single door and Juliet balconies at upper ground and first floor level; replacement of existing French doors with new double glazed uPVC framed French doors at upper ground floor level; replacement of 1no single glazed timber framed door and 1no single glazed timber framed window with new double glazed uPVC framed single doors at lower ground floor level to the rear elevation; replacement of remaining existing single glazed timber framed doors and windows with new double glazed timber framed doors and windows to the front and rear elevations; replacement of 1no existing window with new enlarged double glazed timber framed window to front side of building at lower ground floor level; erection of new replacement external staircase from lower ground to upper ground floor level to the front elevation; replacement of the existing bin store behind the front boundary wall at upper ground floor level; removal of the existing render and to repoint the existing front boundary wall and repave the lower-ground floor of the front garden the steps to the entrance.
